Text:
It's ripped from a "demo disc", the only option in the menu is to select audio and subs.
This you can do by pressing the audio or subtitle button on the remote several times.

I remove all extra to get the best quality on the film.

I adore  people  that removes menues  and  extras,bonusmaterial  from dvdripps ,,,, for  boosting  quality
i'm  hoping  that  moore  starts to do  just  that
 THANX a  million
Yeah, but it makes NO sense at all to remove anything, if you dont keep the size to a full disc, ie 4.36GB!!!
The film is not compressed at all.
why then remove anything and menus ?that's amazing lol..

:-) I don't always think before I remove.. Always do it this way...

I hope some of you keep seeding as soon as you get 100%
I have some more to upload..
It would be so nice if someone who has the full 100% could reseed again so we - stuck at 99.1% - could finally enjoy this movie.  THX a million :)
